text: @SecPompeo USA must allow world health experts to investigate the US Army ’s Fort Derrick Base, to investigate how US fight the Coronavirus pandemic which already killed more than 60,000 Americans, much more than any other country in the world. Pompeo is the enemy of the world! Resign!
